name: Asian Shipowners' Association
goal: ASA acts as a channel to convey Asian shipowners’ views to the international shipping community. At the same time, it is also a platform for all ASA members to liaise with one another and to help promote cooperation, amity and friendship amongst its members.
interests: Communication, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
ASA supports the submission of the Consortia Block Exemption to the EU.

ASA will add the name of ASA to the joint ICS/ECSA/WSC’s comments instead of submitting its own separate comments.
